title: Clean Column Names and Fix Datatypes
body:
- Remove whitespaces and standardize all column names to lowercase + underscores.
- Convert year to integer and rating, completion_rate, and enrollment to appropriate numeric types.
- Save the cleaned dataset to `/data/online_courses_cleaned.csv`.

title: Plot Enrollment Trend by Year and Platform
body:
- Group data by `year` and `platform`
- Create a multi-line plot showing how enrollments have changed over time
- Use Seaborn or Plotly
- Highlight which platforms grew fastest

title: Top 5 Most Popular Topics Globally
body:
- Count enrollments per topic
- Plot top 5 topics in a horizontal bar chart
- Add value labels to the bars

title: Analyze Completion Rate vs Rating
body:
- Create a scatter plot of `rating` vs `completion_rate`
- Color-code points by `platform`
- Add correlation calculation
- Explore relationship between rating and course completion

title: Heatmap — Topics by Country
body:
- Create heatmap showing enrollment of topics by country
- Filter top 10 countries and top 10 topics
- Save to `/notebooks/visuals`

title: Create Starter Streamlit App
body:
- Build `app.py` with sidebar filters (platform, year, topic)
- Display stats: total courses, average rating, completion rate
- Placeholder for visualizations

title: Compare Ratings Across Platforms (Box Plot)
body:
- Boxplot of `rating` grouped by `platform`
- Use Seaborn
- Identify best-rated platforms

title: Contributors Guide & PR Template
body:
- Create `CONTRIBUTING.md` with steps for PRs
- Create `.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md` with a checklist

title: Dashboard Deployment (Streamlit/Hugging Face)
body:
- Deploy Streamlit app online
- Ensure filters and data load correctly
- Add live link to README

title: Add Summary Notebook (summary.ipynb)
body:
- Create notebook summarizing insights
- Include visualizations + markdown interpretations
- Save as `notebooks/summary.ipynb`
